Header: Customs foil an attempt to smuggle out Wallapatta
Content: The Katunayake Airport Customs have foiled an attempt to smuggle out a stock of Wallapatta worth nearly two million rupees. The Wallapatta was concealed in two baggages of an air passenger who was due to fly to Dubai. The Customs officials said that the Weight of the stock of Wallapatta was 21 kilogrammes. Katunayake Deputy Customs Director Vipula Minuwanpitiya said that the suspect is a resident of Negombo. Further investigations are being pursued.
